item.title: Special Track at TECH-EDU 2020: Tools for monitoring Self and Co-Regulation of e-Learning (Tools for SCReL)
item.description: The 2nd International Conference on Technology and Innovation in Learning, Teaching and Education (TECH-EDU 2020) will be held online December 2â€“4. A special track within the conference will undertake examining research on the topic of self- and co-regulation in e-learning environments. The deadline for paper submission has been extended till September 29, 2020.
